title: Is it legal to ride a bicycle on the beach?
text:
To answer your question: Wrightsville Beach does not have any
ordinances forbidding riding a bicycle on the beach strand, according
to the police department. Here's a link to bicycle regulations for
riding on town streets:



http://www.amlegal.com/nxt/gateway.dll/North%20Carolina/wright/townofwrightsvillebeachnorthcarolinacode?f=templates$fn=default.htm$3.0$vid=amlegal:wrightsvillebeach_nc
